meanings.definition: To invite someone to a social event or gathering.
meanings.sent1: She evites her friends to her birthday party.
meanings.sent2: He always evites his coworkers to the company picnic.
meanings.sent3: The cat evites the dog to play chase around the yard.
meanings.sent4: The warm sunshine evites everyone to come outside and enjoy the day.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flyer evites people to the upcoming festival with enticing offers.

meanings.definition: A digital invitation sent via email or social media.
meanings.sent1: I received an evites for the virtual baby shower.
meanings.sent2: The evites for the wedding included all the necessary details.
meanings.sent3: The evites popped up in her inbox just in time for the party.
meanings.sent4: The evites fluttered into the digital world, inviting guests to the event.
meanings.sent5: The evites stood out with its vibrant colors and catchy design.
